name: Scanbase
headline: The API for Diagnostic Test Analysis (COVID-19, FLU, RSV, STD,â¦
description: Scanbase makes it easy for medical companies to convert photos of rapid diagnostic tests into results. We do this by providing a simple API that any medical company can access.
tags: industry:machine-learning; industry:computer-vision; industry:health-tech; industry:telemedicine; industry:ai; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Jeffrey Lange, Founder
founders.description: Jeffrey is currently the CEO of Scanbase, a seed stage diagnostic scanning API used by at-home test manufacturers. He is a graduate of the Rhode Island School of Design.

founders.name: Steve Roger, Founder
founders.description: CTO of Scanbase with 10+ years building enterprise level APIs, and products. Steve holds a degree in CS from UC Berkeley. Ex-LinkedIn.

# Computer Vision Powered At-home Tests
Scanbase makes it easy to convert photos of rapid diagnostic tests into positive or negative results. 
#### Funded and Cited by Word Class Brands
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64df72d6da3093e1ba495e2d_y-combinator-logo.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64de711dbd67da3843cdc556_liquid2.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64de708fdc0f578cb563a20d_techcrunch.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64de704c13cf3c29bec0d6ce_yahoo.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64de702701d66a5e42c84ec9_marketwatch.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64de706ddc0f578cb5637a56_rebel.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64df72d6da3093e1ba495e2d_y-combinator-logo.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/656629216c4b305c3193a690_trac.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/64de711dbd67da3843cdc556_liquid2.jpg)
Scanbase is a **Y Combinator** company tackling some of the most difficult issues in diagnostic imaging.
[Get started](https://www.scanbase.com/</contact/contact>)
## Digital Diagnostics Use Cases
Below Are Some of Our Latest Use Cases
#### Computer Vision
Perform patient monitoring, with accurate data collection, and alerting healthcare providers to critical changes. Analyze diagnostic test results, X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans, aiding in the early detection of diseases and abnormalities. Assist in surgery, offering real-time guidance to surgeons, improving precision, and minimizing risks. 
Platform Advantages Included:
Robust Image Processing 
Image pipelines 
GPU and Cloud Integration
Data privacy and security
Adhere to GDPR or HIPAA
GPU and Cloud Integration
Explanations by models
[Learn More](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
Computer Vision
###### Predictive Modeling & LLMs
[](https://www.scanbase.com/<#>)
Early signs on disease are often buried in historical lab results across a number of biomarkers. Scanbase Predictive AI models and LLMs can traverse these data sets at scale and surface early disease indicators that doctors may have missed and before symptoms appear. For diseases related to the kidneys, liver, or cancer.
Platform Advantages Included:
Integration with LLMs
Adaptable to Languages
Designed to Scale 
Quick Response Times
Content Moderation
Customize LLM Behavior
Privacy, Data Protection 
[Learn More](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
Predictive Modeling & LLMs
###### Unstructured > Structured Data
The Scanbase **AI Platform leverages NLP and machine learning techniques** to extract meaningful information from unstructured data and transform it into highly usable structured formats, enabling organizations to quickly make data-driven decisions and automate processes more effectively.
Platform Advantages Included:
Entity Recognition
Structured Data Schema
Data Normalization
API and Integration Points
Batch and Real-time 
Robust Error Handling
Audit trails, and Versioning
[Learn More](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
Unstructured > Structured Data

MORE ABOUT SCANBASE
## Operationalize AI across your business to deliver benefits quickly
AI/ML Expertise
Dedicated Teams
Healthcare Focused
We support the growth of Medical Diagnostic Enterprises through Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning 
[Get Started](https://www.scanbase.com/</contact/contact>)
### Build Industry Leading Products
Backed by Y Combinator Scanbase is building bleeding edge AI platforms.
[Learn more ](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
### **Develop research-driven technology**
Stay at the forefront of AI innovation with Scanbase Research driving the adoption and scaling of AI.
[Products and Services](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
### **Produce cost-savings solutions**
Improve productivity through faster model development and deployment, yielding millions in benefits.
[Products and Services](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/6568936f6fb3903956372f81_654413143882ff0289a5d463_scanbase-homepage.webp)
AI POWERED DECISION MAKING
## Embed intelligence at the heart of your enterprise.
We are currently experiencing an era marked by unparalleled disruption. Scanbase acknowledges the critical necessity of our customers to harness software for reliable, secure decision-making.
[Learn More today](https://www.scanbase.com/</contact/contact>)
AI Powered Decision Making
## Scanbase is used across the healthcare and life sciences value chain
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/6568942ffb8e6c5f8c4d5668_654442cb5035da78f7312074_iPad-Scanbase-p-1080.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/65443c1c5035da78f72ca53a_scanbase_icon_black.png)
##### Drug discovery, software development, manufacturing, marketing, and sales
Scanbase assists providers, healthcare organizations, and healthcare systems alike.
#### **↳** Problems
At Scanbase, we specialize in addressing complex business challenges with bleeding-edge AI technology. Our tailored solutions are designed to help organizations navigate the ever-changing landscape of business problems, providing strategic insights and innovative approaches to enhance decision-making, optimize processes, and achieve results.
[Learn more](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
#### **↳** Data
Unlock the power of data with Scanbase's Data Intelligence and Management services. We offer comprehensive solutions for collecting, storing, analyzing, and leveraging data effectively. Our expertise ensures that your data becomes a valuable asset, enabling data-driven decision-making and enhancing your competitive advantage.
[Learn more ](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
#### **↳** AI Models
Harness the potential of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Our AI/ML experts create custom models tailored to your unique needs, empowering your organization to derive actionable insights, automate processes, and drive innovation. We specialize in developing models that solve complex problems and drive business growth.
[Learn more](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
#### **↳** Deployment
Successful implementation is crucial for any AI-powered solution. Scanbase offers top-notch deployment and integration services to seamlessly integrate our AI solutions into your existing infrastructure. We ensure that our technology fits seamlessly into your operations, enabling you to maximize the benefits of AI while maintaining security and reliability.
[Learn more](https://www.scanbase.com/</products-and-services>)
[![Digital Health Diagnostic Platform - Scanbase logo footer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6462a814246b59960e927556/6544077a1ec14ec468a7a06e_scanbase-black-logo.jpg)](https://www.scanbase.com/<#>)

generated_description:
Scanbase is an ambitious startup founded in 2022 that's currently making waves in the health tech sector. Based in Los Angeles and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Scanbase is all about simplifying medical diagnostics through technology. Their mission? To serve as "The API for Diagnostic Test Analysis," transforming how companies handle results from tests—be it for COVID-19, the flu, RSV, STDs, and more.

At its core, Scanbase offers a straightforward API that allows medical companies to effortlessly convert photos of rapid diagnostic tests into accurate results. For those familiar with machine learning and computer vision, this is a slick application of those technologies in real-world healthcare scenarios. Their focus is on creating easy-to-integrate solutions that help enhance diagnostic accuracy.

The team at Scanbase is small but mighty, comprising just three employees, underscoring that sometimes, small teams can achieve big things. Their emphasis on machine learning, computer vision, and telemedicine reflects a modern approach to healthcare challenges. They even boast partnerships with some notable names in the health tech scene, which adds credibility to their endeavor.

Currently, the company is engaged in several advanced applications. These include using computer vision for patient monitoring, predictive modeling for early disease detection, and converting unstructured data into structured formats for better data management. In conjunction with their API services, this integration of AI into healthcare processes reflects a desire to not just streamline operations but to fundamentally improve health outcomes.

Scanbase is tackling some of the critical issues in diagnostic imaging and data use within healthcare, making it a promising player to watch in the telemedicine and health-tech space. Their commitment to data privacy and adherence to regulations like GDPR and HIPAA indicates a responsible approach to sensitive information—a must in today's digital age.

If you're interested in delving deeper into their offerings or getting started, you can find more on their website: [Scanbase](https://www.scanbase.com). In short, they provide a forward-thinking solution to diagnostic analysis that could very well shape the future of healthcare diagnostics.
